attributes.action: Stop the reduction in the amount of money received by charities as a result of gift aid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From April 2008 - when the new tax regime comes in - charitable bodies will only be able to claim back £2.50 on a £10 donation. A reduction of 32p. The government should not be taking money from charities.
